GSD.description:
ALSA: usb-audio: Fix potential memory leaks

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.4.220 by commit 988ec0cd0a2643c25c1658f7c33de2e15a5a2e31. For more details please see the references link.
